1370: Helpriko moved to Papenhofstede.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Agnes at age 32 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Agnes, Saxiardis, at age 33.
1372: Had a daughter with Agnes, Rycaldis, at age 34.
1373: Had a son with Agnes, Rissewint, at age 35.
1374: Had a son with Agnes, Walic, at age 36.
1375: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 5 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Agnes, Sara, at age 38.
1380: Had a daughter with Agnes, Wijfgode, at age 42.
1381: Had a son with Agnes, Wouter, at age 43.
1386: Had a daughter with Agnes, Itsburgis, at age 48.
